name: Comocladia dentata

Eyes: WORSE, NEAR WARM STOVE; feels as if pressed outward
Sees only glimmer of light with left eye
Ciliary neuralgia with eyes feeling large and protruded, especially RIGHT
Glaucoma, sense of fullness; EYEBALL FEELS TOO LARGE
Chest: Acute pain in left mammary gland
Cough with pain under left breast, going through to left scapula
Pain from right side of chest down arm to fingers
Skin: Eczema  of the trunk and extremities; also pustular type

details: Important eye and skin symptoms. Affections of antrum. Sacroiliac and abdominal pain. THROBBING PAINS WORSE BY HEAT. Pain in joints and ankles.
